messages.title: Hey You!
messages.message: Hey, what's up? You should really buy some of our really cool stuff. It'll make you more attractive!

messages.title: Buy our chicken!
messages.message: You're gonna love our delicious fried chicken. $1.99 a bucket for a limited time here at Los Pollos Hermanos!

messages.title: Buy our chicken!
messages.message: That sounds awesome! Can I bring my friend Jesse?

messages.title: Buy our chicken!
messages.message: You're gonna love our delicious fried chicken. $1.99 a bucket for a limited time here at Los Pollos Hermanos!

messages.title: Wavy Gravy
messages.message: Are you kidding me with Wavy Gravy? Hazelnuts? Really? No thank you. However, I would like a free Vermonster.

messages.title: Wavy Gravy
messages.message: Yeah, we hate that flavor too. Old people wanted it for some reason and you know they're the only people who vote for these things. Here's a coupon for 15 free Vermonsters. Go crazy.

messages.title: Vermonster
messages.message: Much appreciated. I can't believe I ate the whole thing!
